parameters: \nc<\c[2]Rodinka\>(It's going to be hard to get through it.)
\nc<\c[2]Rodinka\>(This forest is even scarier than the house...)
\nc<\c[2]Rodinka\>(I'm gonna get my hands all scratched up...)
\nc<\c[2]Rodinka\>What did I see in my NIGHTMARE???
\nc<\c[2]Rodinka\>(I need to get back to the caravan.)
\nc<\c[2]Rodinka\>(Developer is a cheapskate!.. He's hiding the loot.)
\nc<\c[2]Rodinka\>(But I don't need to go there.)
\nc<\c[2]Rodinka\>(Of course they're not here. What was I hoping for?)
